snippet: Members of the International Contemporary Ensemble are leading a series of concerts meant to hail Mr. Boulez, the former New York Philharmonic music director who turned 90 this year.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews concert series in tribute to former New York Philharmonic director Pierre Boulez featuring members of International Contemporary Ensemble and bassoonist Pascal Gallois at National Sawdust.
lead_paragraph: Members of the International Contemporary Ensemble are leading a series of concerts meant to hail Mr. Boulez, the former New York Philharmonic music director who turned 90 this year.

headline.main: Review: A Pierre Boulez Tribute, Eight Months Late
